00019 #ifndef _COPPERPLATE_SYNCOBJ_H
00020 #define _COPPERPLATE_SYNCOBJ_H
00021 
00022 #include <pthread.h>
00023 #include <copperplate/list.h>
00024 #include <copperplate/lock.h>
00025 
00026 /* syncobj->flags */
00027 #define SYNCOBJ_FIFO    0x0
00028 #define SYNCOBJ_PRIO    0x1
00029 #define SYNCOBJ_LOCKED  0x2
00030 
00031 /* threadobj->wait_status */
00032 #define SYNCOBJ_FLUSHED         0x1
00033 #define SYNCOBJ_SIGNALED        0x2
00034 #define SYNCOBJ_DRAINWAIT       0x4
00035 
00036 /* threadobj->wait_hook(status) */
00037 #define SYNCOBJ_BLOCK   0x1
00038 #define SYNCOBJ_RESUME  0x2
00039 
00040 #define SYNCOBJ_MAGIC  0xf9f99f9f
00041 
00042 struct threadobj;
00043 
00044 struct syncstate {
00045         int state;
00046 };
00047 
00048 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_COBALT
00049 
00050 struct syncobj_corespec {
00051         cobalt_monitor_t monitor;
00052 };
00053 
00054 #else  /* CONFIG_XENO_MERCURY */
00055 
00056 struct syncobj_corespec {
00057         pthread_mutex_t lock;
00058         pthread_cond_t drain_sync;
00059 };
00060 
00061 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_MERCURY */
00062 
00063 struct syncobj {
00064         unsigned int magic;
00065         int flags;
00066         int wait_count;
00067         struct list grant_list;
00068         int grant_count;
00069         struct list drain_list;
00070         int drain_count;
00071         struct syncobj_corespec core;
00072         fnref_type(void (*)(struct syncobj *sobj)) finalizer;
00073 };
00074 
00075 #define syncobj_for_each_waiter(sobj, pos)              \
00076         list_for_each_entry(pos, &(sobj)->grant_list, wait_link)
00077 
00078 #define syncobj_for_each_waiter_safe(sobj, pos, tmp)    \
00079         list_for_each_entry_safe(pos, tmp, &(sobj)->grant_list, wait_link)
00080 
00081 void __syncobj_cleanup_wait(struct syncobj *sobj,
00082                             struct threadobj *thobj);
00083 
00084 #ifdef __XENO_DEBUG__
00085 
00086 static inline void __syncobj_tag_locked(struct syncobj *sobj)
00087 {
00088         sobj->flags |= SYNCOBJ_LOCKED;
00089 }
00090 
00091 static inline void __syncobj_tag_unlocked(struct syncobj *sobj)
00092 {
00093         assert(sobj->flags & SYNCOBJ_LOCKED);
00094         sobj->flags &= ~SYNCOBJ_LOCKED;
00095 }
00096 
00097 static inline void __syncobj_check_locked(struct syncobj *sobj)
00098 {
00099         assert(sobj->flags & SYNCOBJ_LOCKED);
00100 }
00101 
00102 #else /* !__XENO_DEBUG__ */
00103 
00104 static inline void __syncobj_tag_locked(struct syncobj *sobj)
00105 {
00106 }
00107 
00108 static inline void __syncobj_tag_unlocked(struct syncobj *sobj)
00109 {
00110 }
00111 
00112 static inline void __syncobj_check_locked(struct syncobj *sobj)
00113 {
00114 }
00115 
00116 #endif /* !__XENO_DEBUG__ */
00117 
00118 #ifdef __cplusplus
00119 extern "C" {
00120 #endif
00121 
00122 int __syncobj_broadcast_drain(struct syncobj *sobj, int reason);
00123 
00124 int __syncobj_broadcast_grant(struct syncobj *sobj, int reason);
00125 
00126 void syncobj_init(struct syncobj *sobj, int flags,
00127                   fnref_type(void (*)(struct syncobj *sobj)) finalizer);
00128 
00129 int syncobj_wait_grant(struct syncobj *sobj,
00130                  const struct timespec *timeout,
00131                  struct syncstate *syns);
00132 
00133 struct threadobj *syncobj_grant_one(struct syncobj *sobj);
00134 
00135 void syncobj_grant_to(struct syncobj *sobj,
00136                       struct threadobj *thobj);
00137 
00138 struct threadobj *syncobj_peek_grant(struct syncobj *sobj);
00139 
00140 struct threadobj *syncobj_peek_drain(struct syncobj *sobj);
00141 
00142 int syncobj_lock(struct syncobj *sobj,
00143                  struct syncstate *syns);
00144 
00145 void syncobj_unlock(struct syncobj *sobj,
00146                     struct syncstate *syns);
00147 
00148 int syncobj_wait_drain(struct syncobj *sobj,
00149                        const struct timespec *timeout,
00150                        struct syncstate *syns);
00151 
00152 int syncobj_destroy(struct syncobj *sobj,
00153                     struct syncstate *syns);
00154 
00155 void syncobj_uninit(struct syncobj *sobj);
00156 
00157 static inline int syncobj_grant_wait_p(struct syncobj *sobj)
00158 {
00159         __syncobj_check_locked(sobj);
00160 
00161         return !list_empty(&sobj->grant_list);
00162 }
00163 
00164 static inline int syncobj_count_grant(struct syncobj *sobj)
00165 {
00166         __syncobj_check_locked(sobj);
00167 
00168         return sobj->grant_count;
00169 }
00170 
00171 static inline int syncobj_count_drain(struct syncobj *sobj)
00172 {
00173         __syncobj_check_locked(sobj);
00174 
00175         return sobj->drain_count;
00176 }
00177 
00178 static inline int syncobj_drain(struct syncobj *sobj)
00179 {
00180         int ret = 0;
00181 
00182         __syncobj_check_locked(sobj);
00183 
00184         if (sobj->drain_count > 0)
00185                 ret = __syncobj_broadcast_drain(sobj, SYNCOBJ_SIGNALED);
00186 
00187         return ret;
00188 }
00189 
00190 static inline int syncobj_grant_all(struct syncobj *sobj)
00191 {
00192         int ret = 0;
00193 
00194         __syncobj_check_locked(sobj);
00195 
00196         if (sobj->grant_count > 0)
00197                 ret = __syncobj_broadcast_grant(sobj, SYNCOBJ_SIGNALED);
00198 
00199         return ret;
00200 }
00201 
00202 static inline int syncobj_flush(struct syncobj *sobj)
00203 {
00204         __syncobj_check_locked(sobj);
00205 
00206         if (sobj->grant_count > 0)
00207                 __syncobj_broadcast_grant(sobj, SYNCOBJ_FLUSHED);
00208 
00209         if (sobj->drain_count > 0)
00210                 __syncobj_broadcast_drain(sobj, SYNCOBJ_FLUSHED);
00211 
00212         return sobj->wait_count;
00213 }
00214 
00215 #ifdef __cplusplus
00216 }
00217 #endif
00218 
00219 #endif /* _COPPERPLATE_SYNCOBJ_H */
